subject: Re: Simsonn Shipping Confirmation #SSN2229
description_text:
Greetings.

Thank you for the information, as you have stated in a previous exchange
that EU stock will be delivered to the warehouse AFTER 7th
I was aware that it will be shipped at a later date.

I am grateful for your communication and DO NOT REQUIRE expedited shipping.

Kind regards,
Matic Lindič

V V pet., 8. avg. 2025 ob 11:00 je oseba SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>
napisala:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> We apologize for the delay. Due to stock shortages at our German
> warehouse, we plan to wait until around the 11th for new goods to arrive at
> the German warehouse before shipping your order. This will help avoid
> customs duties. Since all previous shipments to Slovenia have been sent via
> the German warehouse, we are unsure whether shipping directly from China
> would result in unexpectedly high taxes. If you require the goods urgently,
> we can arrange for UPS to ship them to you. Please let us know your
> preference as soon as possible.
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>


-- 
Matic Lindič
